anya-e0201n0:18_0: Vaṇṇo, saro, savaṇṇo, dīgho, rasso, byañjano, vaggo, niggahītaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:20_0: Aādayo bindantā tecattālīsakkharā vaṇṇā nāma honti.
anya-e0201n0:21_0: A, ā, i, ī, u, ū, eta, e, ota, o. Ka, kha, ga, gha, ṅa, ca, cha, ja, jha, ña, ṭa, ṭha, ḍa, ḍha, ṇa, ta, tha, da, dha, na, pa, pha, ba, bha, ma, ya, ra, la,va sa, ha, ḷa, aṁ.
anya-e0201n0:21_3: nāmapaññattirūpattā nakkharanti khayavayaṁ na gacchantīti akkharā.
anya-e0201n0:23_0: Tesu vaṇṇesu ādimhi dasa vaṇṇā sarā nāma honti.
anya-e0201n0:23_1: Sayameva laddhasarūpā hutvā rājanti virocantīti sarā.
anya-e0201n0:25_0: Tesu saresu dve dvesarā savaṇṇā nāma honti.
anya-e0201n0:26_0: A, ā avaṇṇo, i, ī ivaṇṇo, u, ū uvaṇṇo, eta,
anya-e0201n0:28_0: Dvīsu dvīsu savaṇṇesu yo yo pubbo hoti,
anya-e0201n0:29_0: Tattha eta, ota iti dve ekapadasaṁyoge pare kvaci labbhanti. Eṭṭhi, seṭṭho, oṭṭho, sotthi.
anya-e0201n0:30_2: Maṁ ce tvaṁ nikhaṇaṁ vane, jā.
anya-e0201n0:31_1: Ekapadasaṁyogepi vaggantesu vā ya, ra, la,
anya-e0201n0:31_2: vesu vā paresu rassā mā hontūti. Enti, senti, eyya, bhāseyya, meṇḍo, soṇḍo.
anya-e0201n0:33_0: Dvīsu dvīsu savaṇṇesu yo yo paro hoti,
anya-e0201n0:35_0: Tesu vaṇṇesu kādayo bindantā vaṇṇā byañjanā nāma honti.
anya-e0201n0:37_0: Tesu byañjanesu kādi-mantā pañcabyañjanapañcakā vaggā nāma honti.
anya-e0201n0:38_6: Vaṇṇuddese ekaṭṭhānikānaṁ byañjanānaṁ vagge samūhe niyuttāti vaggā.
anya-e0201n0:40_0: Ante bindumatto vaṇṇo niggahītaṁ nāma. Niggayha gayhati uccāriyatīti niggahītaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:46_0: Karaṇaṁ catubbidhaṁ – jivhāmūlaṁ, jivhopaggaṁ, jivhaggaṁ, sakaṭṭhānanti.
anya-e0201n0:47_2: Tattha karaṇānaṁ sakasakaṭṭhānehi saddhiṁ saṁvaraṇādiko visesākāro saṁvuṭādi nāma.
anya-e0201n0:48_0: Tattha kaṇṭhapadesānaṁ aññamaññaṁ saṅghaṭṭanena uppannā avaṇṇa, kavagga,
anya-e0201n0:48_6: Upari dantapantiyaṁ jivhaggasaṅghaṭṭanena uppannā tavagga, la,
anya-e0201n0:48_16: Yadā hakāro vaggantehi vā ya, ra, la,
anya-e0201n0:48_18: tadā urajoti vadanti. Pañho, tuṇhi, nhāto, vimhito, gayhate, vulhate, avhānaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:49_0: Kaṇṭhaṁ saṁvaritvā uccārito akāro saṁvuṭo nāma.
anya-e0201n0:49_2: karaṇāni vivaritvā uccāritā sesasarā ca sa,
anya-e0201n0:49_4: Tāniyeva gāḷhaṁ phusāpetvā uccāritā pañcavaggā phuṭṭhā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:49_5: Thokaṁ phusāpetvā uccāritā ya, ra, la,
anya-e0201n0:49_7: Tattha oṭṭhajesu tāva pavaggaṁ vadantānaṁ oṭṭhadvayassa gāḷhaṁ phusanaṁ icchitabbaṁ. Kasmā?
anya-e0201n0:49_9: Uvaṇṇaṁ vadantānaṁ pana oṭṭhadvayassa vivaraṇaṁ icchitabbaṁ. Kasmā?
anya-e0201n0:50_0: Cūḷaniruttiyaṁ pana sabbe rassasarā saṁvuṭā nāma,
anya-e0201n0:50_7: Tasmā nānāvaṇṇānaṁ saṁsagge payatanānaṁ saṁsaggabhedopi veditabboti.
anya-e0201n0:50_17: Tasmā kammavācaṁ sāventehi nāma ṭhāna, karaṇa,
anya-e0201n0:51_0: Sithilañca, dhanitañca, dīghaṁ, rassaṁ, garuṁ, lahuṁ;
anya-e0201n0:53_5: Dīghā ceva saṁyogapubbā ca niggahītantā ca garukā nāma.
anya-e0201n0:53_7: Yathā saddasahito vāto mukhachiddena bahi anikkhamma nāsasotābhimukho hoti,
anya-e0201n0:53_8: tathā mukhaṁ avivaṭaṁ katvā vattabbaṁ byañjanaṁ niggahītaṁ nāma.
anya-e0201n0:58_0: Anitthiliṅgassa nāmassa ante ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā kamena jhalasaññā honti.
anya-e0201n0:63_0: , Ā iti dvipadaṁ. Itthiliṅge ākāro ghasañño hoti.
anya-e0201n0:69_0: Sutte yaṁ visesanaṁ dissati, tassa vidhi ñātabbo.
anya-e0201n0:70_0: ‘Ato yonaṁ ṭāṭe’. Narā, nare. Yonanti visesanaṁ. Ṭāṭeti vidhi.
anya-e0201n0:78_0: Parassa sissamāno dissamāno (mū) vidhi ādivaṇṇassa ñātabbo.
anya-e0201n0:93_0: Ñānubandho āgamo ca kānubandho āgamo ca kamena chaṭṭhīniddiṭṭhassa ādimhi ca ante ca ñātabbo.
anya-e0201n0:99_0: Mānubandho āgamo sarānaṁ antasaramhā paro hoti.
anya-e0201n0:101_1: purisa iccādīsu liṅgapadesu eva atthi, gamu,
anya-e0201n0:101_7: Tato ‘najjāyo svāma’ iti suttena ā- kārāgamo.
anya-e0201n0:103_0: Samānavisayānaṁ dvinnaṁ vidhīnaṁ aññamaññapaṭisedharahite ṭhāne yebhuyyena paro vidhi okāsaṁ labhati.
anya-e0201n0:104_1: ettha cattārimeti pubbalope sampatte paralopo okāsaṁ labhati.
anya-e0201n0:106_0: Yo vaṇṇo payogassa avayavo na hoti, suttesu saṅketamatto hoti, so anubandho nāma.
anya-e0201n0:107_0: ‘Gossāva’. Gavassaṁ-etena padarūpavidhāne anubandho upayogaṁ na gacchatīti ñāpeti.
anya-e0201n0:111_0: Ntuiti vutte vantu, mantu, āvantu, tavantūnaṁ sambandhībhūto ntukāro gayhati.
anya-e0201n0:112_0: ‘Ntantūnaṁ nto yomhi paṭhame’. Guṇavanto, satimanto, yāvanto, bhuttavanto.
anya-e0201n0:116_0: Lopo, dīgho, rasso, vuddhi, ādeso, āgamo, dvibhāvo, vipallāso.
anya-e0201n0:119_0: Luppatīti lopo. Sare pare sarūpo vā asarūpo vā pubbo saro lopo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:128_0: Pubbasaramhā sarūpo vā asarūpo vā paro saro kvaci lopo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:132_7: kinnumāva samaṇiyo madhuvā maññati bālo dha. pa. 69,
anya-e0201n0:133_0: Kvacīti kiṁ? Katamā cānanda aniccasaññā a. ni. 10.60.
anya-e0201n0:136_0: Dve pubbaparasarā kvaci lopā na honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:137_0: Appamādo amataṁ padaṁ dha. pa. 21, ko imaṁ pathaviṁvicessati dha. pa. 44.
anya-e0201n0:140_0: Ito paṭṭhāya yāvasandhikaṇḍāvasānā yuttaṭṭhānesu sabbattha kvacisaddo,
anya-e0201n0:142_0: Niggahītamhā parasarassa kvaci lopo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:143_1: candaṁva vimalaṁ suddhaṁ dha. pa. 413; su. ni. 642,
anya-e0201n0:146_0: Saṁyogassa ādibhūto byañjano kvaci lopo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:147_2: evaṁsa te āsavā pahīnā honti ma. ni. 1.24,
anya-e0201n0:148_0: Tīsu byañjanesu sarūpānaṁ dvinnaṁ ādibyañjanassa lopo –
anya-e0201n0:148_3: ekasataṁ khatyā jā. 2.22.594, ratyo, ratyā, ratyaṁ,
anya-e0201n0:148_4: sakvāhaṁ mārisa devānamindo saṁ. ni. 1.268, iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:162_0: Sārāgo, sāratto, avisāhāro, sārambho, sāraddho, sāketaṁ nagaraṁ, sādhāraṇaṁ, saṁ assa atthīti sāmī.
anya-e0201n0:167_0: Vicchāyaṁ ekassa vibhatyantassa padassa dvitte kate pubbapadassa syādilopo hoti.
anya-e0201n0:174_0: Mahāvuttisuttamidaṁ, tadaminādīni padarūpāni iminā nipātanena sijjhantīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:176_9: phalaṁ ve kadaliṁ hanti a. ni. 4.68,
anya-e0201n0:186_1: roruvoiccādīsu pana atisayatthadīpanatthaṁ padadvittaṁ katvā pubbapadesu akkharalopo.
anya-e0201n0:188_0: Datto=devadatto, assehi yutto ratho=assaratho, rūpabhavo=rūpaṁ, arūpabhavo=arūpaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:193_0: Pakkhittamidaṁ suttaṁ. Luttehi vā ādesakatehi vā vaṇṇehi sesā rassasarā kvaci dīghā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:195_3: saddhīdha vittaṁ purisassa seṭṭhaṁ su. ni. 183,
anya-e0201n0:195_4: anāgārehi cūbhayaṁ dha. pa. 404; su. ni. 633,
anya-e0201n0:197_6: kiṁsūdha vittaṁ purisassa seṭṭhaṁ su. ni.
anya-e0201n0:201_0: Myāyaṁdhammo mahāva. 7, svāhaṁ pe. va. 485, vityānubhūyate iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:202_0: Yadipi imāni rūpāni byañjane uparisuttena sijjhanti,
anya-e0201n0:202_1: luttādesesu pana niccamiva dīghasiddhiñāpanatthaṁ idaṁ suttaṁ pakkhittanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:204_2: Tattha dīghavidhi nāma gāthāvasena vā āgamavasena vā vacanasukhavasena vā buddhisukhavasena vā hoti.
anya-e0201n0:206_2: evaṁ gāme munī care dha. pa. 49,
anya-e0201n0:206_3: sakko ujū ca suhujū ca khu. pā.
anya-e0201n0:213_0: Sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ pārā. 1, sātthikā dhammadesanā, cakkhumāssa yathā andho iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:214_0: Bindulutte pana sārāgo, sāratto iccādīni pubbe uddhaṭāniyeva.
anya-e0201n0:217_1: bhovādi nāma so hoti dha. pa. 396; su. ni. 625,
anya-e0201n0:223_0: Kataññutā, atthaññutā, dhammaññutā, kaññato, nadito, vadhuto.
anya-e0201n0:231_0: Luttā pubbasaramhā vā parasaramhā vā sesānaṁ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ kamena e, oādesā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:233_0: Bandhusseva samāgamo, ateva me acchariyaṁ jā. 2.22.1988, vāteritaṁ, jineritaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:237_0: Veti, apeti, upeti, apekkhā, upekkhā iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:241_0: Sundarā itthī sotthi, sundaro attho yassāti sotthi, rassattaṁ, maṅgalaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:246_0: Sare pare ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ ya, vādesā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:249_0: Vātveva? Itissa muhuttampi pāci. 465, atisigaṇo, adhīritaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:250_0: Ettha ca iccetantiādīsu iminā suttena iti, pati, atiputi, jāti, abhi,
anya-e0201n0:250_2: varaṇāna’…nti suttena yamhi tavaggassa cattaṁ, ‘vagga, la,
anya-e0201n0:250_3: sehi te’ti suttena yassa pubbarūpattaṁ, abhi,
anya-e0201n0:254_0: Sare pare e, onaṁ ya, vādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:255_14: ettha ca avisiṭṭhepi vacanasadde ye+assāti padacchedabuddhisukhatthaṁ ‘yyassā’ti potthakāropanaṁ yujjatiyeva,
anya-e0201n0:256_0: Vātveva? So ahaṁ vicarissāmi su. ni. 194, so ahaṁ bhante.
anya-e0201n0:261_21: pallaṅkoiccādīsu parisadde rassa lattaṁ katvā issa ‘yavā sare’ti yatte kate yassa pubbarūpattaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:265_0: Evasadde pare itisaddassa i-kārassa vo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:266_4: mahāsammatotveva paṭhamaṁ akkharaṁ nibbattaṁ dī. ni. 3.131,
anya-e0201n0:267_0: Vāti kiṁ? Iccevattho, samuddoteva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0201n0:276_0: Sare pare gossa antassa avaṅa hoti.
anya-e0201n0:278_0: Suttavibhattena byañjanepi. Sagavacaṇḍo a. ni. 4.108, paragavacaṇḍo.
anya-e0201n0:283_1: taṁ etaṁ atthajātaṁ iminā pariyāyena veditabbanti attho,
anya-e0201n0:285_10: na no samaṁ atthi khu. pā. 6.3,
anya-e0201n0:285_11: na hi no saṅkarantena ma. ni. 3.272,
anya-e0201n0:289_2: so tena vacanena atthaṁ na abandhi na labhītyattho.
anya-e0201n0:294_2: kārassa kvaci te eva vagga la,
anya-e0201n0:297_0: Ādesabhūte vā vibhattibhūte vā paccayabhūte vā ya-
anya-e0201n0:302_0: ‘Tavagga varaṇāna…’nti iminā suttena yamhi rassa yattaṁ –
anya-e0201n0:307_0: Puthabyā, puthabyaṁ, bhātu apaccaṁ bhātabyo, korabyo, dive bhavaṁ dibbaṁ dibyaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:313_0: Paṭihaññati, paṭaggi dātabbo, paṭicchanno, paṭippanno, byāvaṭo, udāhaṭo, dukkaṭaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:317_4: karaṇīyaṁ, karaṇaṁ, ñāṇaṁ, tāṇaṁ, pamāṇaṁ, saraṇaṁ,
anya-e0201n0:322_0: Nikkhamati, nikkhanto, nekkhamo, rājakiccaṁ karotīti khattā, kattā vā.
anya-e0201n0:334_0: Vinicchayo, acchariyaṁ, macchariyaṁ, raṁsiyo niccharanti-nigacchantīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:336_0: Atthi sāhassa jīvitaṁ jā. 2.22.314 -chāhaṁ+assāti chedo, saḷāyatanaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:340_0: Nissāya jāyatīti niyo, niyako vā, niyaṁ puttaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:342_0: Paṇṇatti paññatti, paṇṇāsaṁ paññāsaṁ. Paṇṇavīsati pañcavīsati.
anya-e0201n0:344_0: Nāmamattaṁ na nāyati, animittā na nāyare visuddhi. aṭṭha. 1.228 – na paññāyantīti attho.
anya-e0201n0:350_0: Jino, pino, lino, paṭisallino, paḷino, malino, supino, pahīno, dhuno, puno, luno, āhunaṁ, pāhunaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:354_0: Pariḷāho, āgantvā chavaṁ dahanti etthāti āḷahanaṁ, susānaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:356_0: Sugato, tathāgato, kusito, udati pasavatīti utu.
anya-e0201n0:358_0: Ekamidāhaṁ bhikkhave samayaṁ ma. ni. 1.501 -idhāti vā nipāto.
anya-e0201n0:360_0: Sāhu dassanamariyānaṁ dha. pa. 206, saṁhitaṁ, vihitaṁ, pihitaṁ,
anya-e0201n0:362_0: Upaññāso=upanyāso, ñāyo=nyāyo-niccaṁ eti phalaṁ etenāti ñāyo, ñeyyaṁ=neyyaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:364_0: Thenassa kammaṁ theyyaṁ, therādhinanti therādheyyaṁ, pātimokkhaṁ, parādheyyakaṁ dukkhaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:368_0: Sambahulaṁ=sampahulaṁ, bahusanto na bharati su. ni. 98 =pahu santo na bharati.
anya-e0201n0:372_0: Cirappavāsiṁ dha. pa. 219, hatthippabhinnaṁ dha. pa. 326.
anya-e0201n0:380_2: sīlabbataṁ, nibbānaṁ, nibbutaṁ, dibbaṁ, dibbati, sibbati, kubbati, kubbanto, krubbati,
anya-e0201n0:384_1: “uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā” ti ettha pana uddissa tiṭṭhanaṁ uttiṭṭhanti attho.
anya-e0201n0:386_0: Niccaṁ dahati etthāti nidāgho, laghu lahu.
anya-e0201n0:392_0: Uddhammo, ubbinayo, uppatho, ummaggo, uññā avaññā, uññātaṁ avaññātaṁ, ujjhānasaññī.
anya-e0201n0:396_8: Ko te diṭṭho vā suto vā,
anya-e0201n0:400_1: khetrajo putto attajo, khettajo, gotrabhū, vatrabhū, citraṁ, vicitraṁ, cittaṁ, vicittaṁ,
anya-e0201n0:400_4: yātrā ca me bhavissati ma. ni.
anya-e0201n0:418_0: Vaggabyañjane pare niggahītassa sakavaggantabyañjanādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:419_12: na taṁ kammaṁ kataṁ sādhu iccādīsu dha. pa.
anya-e0201n0:421_0: Vaggāvaggesu byañjanesu paresu niggahītaṁ pararūpaṁ gacchati –
anya-e0201n0:422_14: Imasmiṁ ganthe ekattha siddhampi taṁ taṁ rūpaṁ tattha tattha punappunampi vidhiyyati ñāṇavicittatthaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:424_0: Sare pare niggahītassa kvaci ma, ya, dā honti vā.
anya-e0201n0:425_0: Tattha dādeso ya, ta, etasaddehi napuṁsake dissati –
anya-e0201n0:426_0: Yadabravi jā. 1.2.143, tadaniccaṁ ma. ni. 2.19, etadavoca satthā su. ni. dvayatānupassanāsutta.
anya-e0201n0:428_4: tattha yassa atthassa vā yassa padassa vā yassā kathāya vā anantaraṁ yadanantaraṁ.
anya-e0201n0:429_0: Kvacitveva? Yametaṁ vārijaṁ pupphaṁ, adinnaṁ upasiṅghasi jā. 1.6.115.
anya-e0201n0:430_0: Mādeso ya, ta, etasaddehi pumitthiliṅgesu dissati –
anya-e0201n0:432_0: Aññasaddehi pana dve ādesā tiliṅge dissanti –
anya-e0201n0:434_0: Yādeso idaṁsadde pare tasaddamhā eva kvaci dissati –
anya-e0201n0:435_0: Tayidaṁ na sādhu jā. 2.22.279, tayidaṁ na suṭṭhu jā. 2.22.279.
anya-e0201n0:437_0: Ya, eva, hisaddesu paresu niggahītassa ño hoti. Yassa pubbarūpattaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:440_0: Yamhi pare saṁ upasaggassa niggahītassa ño hoti. Yassa pubbarūpattaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:450_0: Aḍḍhe ājāyare kule saṁ. ni. 1.49, manussesu paccājāto, āpūrati tassa yaso pari. 386.
anya-e0201n0:452_0: Dhammikathaṁ katvā pārā. 39, sarantā sapanti gacchantīti sarisapā.
anya-e0201n0:454_0: Kabaḷīkāro, manasīkāro, manasīkaroti, tappākaṭīkaroti, dūrībhūto, abyayībhāvo.
anya-e0201n0:458_0: Parosataṁ, saradosataṁ, disodisaṁ dha. pa. 42 iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:459_0: ‘Atippago kho tāva piṇḍāya caritu’ dī. ni. 3.1 nti ettha pātottho pagosaddo eva.
anya-e0201n0:462_0: Sare pareva na, ta, ra, gā ca ma, ya, dā ca āgamā honti.
anya-e0201n0:463_0: Go, to, do, no, mo, yo, ro, vo,
anya-e0201n0:469_0: Udaggo, udabbahi, udapādi, udayo, udāhaṭo, udito, udīrito,
anya-e0201n0:469_3: dubhayāni viceyya paṇḍarāni su. ni. 531, todeyya,
anya-e0201n0:473_7: Tathā kena te idha mijjhati pe. va. 181,
anya-e0201n0:477_35: Ettha ca yathā “atiriva kallarūpā su. ni. 688,
anya-e0201n0:477_42: netaṁ ajjatanāmiva” iccādīsu ivasaddo evatthe vattati.
anya-e0201n0:493_0: Mahāvuttinā padānaṁ ante gata, jāta, anta saddā āgamā honti.
anya-e0201n0:498_3: Rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁ siñcati iccādi vibhatyantapadadvittaṁ nāma. Titikkhā, tikicchā, jagamā,
anya-e0201n0:500_0: Saramhā parassa byañjanassa kvaci dve rūpāni honti.
anya-e0201n0:501_0: Tattha saramhā pa, pati, paṭīnaṁ passa dvittaṁ –
anya-e0201n0:504_0: Kī, kudha, kamu, kusa, gaha, juta, ñā, si, su, sambhu, sara,
anya-e0201n0:518_0: Aññā, paññā, abhiññā, pariññā, viññāṇaṁ, sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ, rattaññū, atthaññū, dhammaññū.
anya-e0201n0:534_0: Ukkaṁsati, ukkaṁso, uggaho, uccāreti, uccāro, uccayo,
anya-e0201n0:536_1: duccaritaṁ, duttaro, duddamo, dunnayo, dupposo, dubbalo, dummaggo,
anya-e0201n0:538_1: nikkhanto, niggato, niccoro, nijjaro, niddoso, nippāpo, nimmito, nimmāno, niyyānaṁ, nillolo, nibbānaṁ,
anya-e0201n0:540_0: Kusalattikaṁ, vedanattikaṁ, vatthuttayaṁ, ratanattayaṁ, dvattiṁsaṁ, tettiṁsaṁ.
anya-e0201n0:542_0: Catubbidhaṁ, catuddasa, catuddisaṁ, catuppadaṁ, chabbidhaṁ, channavuti.
anya-e0201n0:545_0: Sajjano, sappuriso, saddhammo, santassa bhāvo sattā, sabbhāvo.
anya-e0201n0:547_0: Sīlabbataṁ, nibbānaṁ, nibbutaṁ iccādi pubbe vuttameva.
anya-e0201n0:549_0: Vattati, pavattati, nivattati, saṁvattati, vaṭṭati, vivaṭṭati.
anya-e0201n0:556_5: ‘Saramhā dve’ti suttena vā ‘vaggalasehi te’iccādīhi vā dutiya,
anya-e0201n0:556_6: catutthānampi sadisatte jāte puna iminā suttena ādidutiyassa paṭhamattaṁ,
anya-e0201n0:558_0: Ākkhātaṁ, pakkhittaṁ, pakkhepo, rūpakkhandho, vedanākkhandho, dhātukkhobho, āyukkhayo, nakkhamati.
anya-e0201n0:560_0: Pamukhe sādhu pāmokkhaṁ, paggharati, ugghosati, nigghoso.
anya-e0201n0:564_0: Yatraṭṭhitaṁ, tatraṭṭhito, uṭṭhito, niṭṭhito, thalaṭṭho, jalaṭṭho, vuḍḍho iccādi.
anya-e0201n0:568_8: usabhassa bhāvo osabbhaṁ, labbhati, ārabbho, ārabbha,
anya-e0201n0:569_0: Idhapi u, du, nito parapadānaṁ ādibyañjanassa dvittaṁ visesato icchanti.
anya-e0201n0:572_0: Vicchāyaṁ abhikkhaññe ca anekatthassa ekapadassa dve rūpāni honti.
anya-e0201n0:572_1: Bhinne atthe kriyāya vā dabbena vā guṇena vā byāpituṁ icchā vicchā.
anya-e0201n0:580_3: vītihāratthe gamyamāne sabbādīnaṁ sabbanāmānaṁ dve rūpāni honti,
anya-e0201n0:583_3: Turitena vacīpayogena taṁ taṁ upāyadīpanaṁ sambhamo,
anya-e0201n0:583_5: sambhame gamyamāne yāvatā yattakena padena so attho paññāyati,
anya-e0201n0:583_7: dvikkhattuṁ vā tikkhattuṁ vā taduttari vā udīriyatetyattho.
anya-e0201n0:585_0: Hāse, soke, pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṁ budho.
anya-e0201n0:599_0: Abhikkamatha vāseṭṭhā abhikkamatha vāseṭṭhā dī. ni. 2.210.
anya-e0201n0:601_0: Kahaṁ ekaputtaka kahaṁ ekaputtaka saṁ. ni. 4.120.
anya-e0201n0:603_0: Abhikkantaṁ bho gotama abhikkantaṁ bho gotama ma. ni.
anya-e0201n0:603_2: Tikkhattuṁudānaṁ udānesi “namo tassa bhagavato” ma. ni.
anya-e0201n0:610_0: Yamhi pare hassa pubbāparavipallāso hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:611_0: Dayhati, saṅgayhati, sannayhati, vuyhati, duyhati, muyhati.
anya-e0201n0:614_0: Vamhi pare hassa vipallāso hoti vā.
anya-e0201n0:615_0: Bavhābādho bahvābādho, bavhettha nhāyatī jano udā. 9 =bahvettha nhāyatī jano.
anya-e0201n0:620_0: Nirayamhi apaccisuṁ jā. 2.22.60, te me asse ayācisuṁ jā. 2.22.1863. Imā gāthā abhāsisuṁ.
anya-e0201n0:627_4: Etena sabbasaddasuttesu aniṭṭhanivatti ca iṭṭhapariggaho ca kato hoti.
